    • Method Detail

      • classify

        public byte[] classify(double[] inputs)

        Obtain the associated class of one observation

        Specified by:
        classify in interface IClassifier
        Parameters:
        inputs - Double array with all inputs of the observation
        Returns:
        byte [] Array indicating the class of the observation For example, {0,0,1} indicates that observation is of the third class, {0,1,0} indicates that observation is of the second class

      • classify

        public byte[][] classify(double[][] inputs)

        Obtain the associated class of a set of observations, through their inputs values

        Specified by:
        classify in interface IClassifier
        Parameters:
        inputs - Double matrix with all inputs of all observations
        Returns:
        byte[] Matrix indicating the class of the observation For example, {0,0,1} indicates that observation is of the third class, {0,1,0} indicates that observation is of the second class
